main_definition: A webpage is a single document or page of content that is part of the World Wide Web, typically containing text, images, links to other webpages, and multimedia elements.

meanings_and_examples.example: The homepage of Amazon.com acts as a gateway to all their products and services.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Page on a specific subject or topic
meanings_and_examples.example: A webpage dedicated to discussing the latest developments in artificial intelligence research.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Digital marketing tool for promoting goods, services or events
meanings_and_examples.example: An event website with information about an upcoming music festival and ticket purchasing options.
